column1: Local Foods////We had the Banh Mi and the seafood sandwich and let me say they were amazing. The Kale and slaw sides were delightful
column2: and the fresh made watermelon lemonade was so refreshing. More importantly
column3: the service was impeccable. They went out of their way to make sure that we had a wonderful experience
column4: and mission accomplished! Thanks Local Deli!
